DataElement.preferredDefinition: The occipital-frontal circumference of a head for children less than 3 years of age.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Less Than Three Year Age Head Circumference
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status._A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one._A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period._How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth._A circumferential measurement of the head at the widest point, which is traditionally above the eyebrows.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Less Than Three Year Age Head Circumference
Property.preferredDefinition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.:A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.:A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.:How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.:A circumferential measurement of the head at the widest point, which is traditionally above the eyebrows.

Concepts.definition: A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.
A natural number greater than 2 and less than 4 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of two and one.
A period of time that it takes for Earth to make a complete revolution around the sun, approximately 365 days; a specific one year period.
How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
A circumferential measurement of the head at the widest point, which is traditionally above the eyebrows.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: general description of an individual's physical appearance and vital status.
